strym.tools.coord_precheck¶

strym.tools.coord_precheck(x, y)¶

Check the x, y coordinates for consistency and lengths If x and y are not of the same length, it should return False

Parameters
x : list`| `pd.Series | np.array

X-coordinates

y : list`| `pd.Series | np.array

Y-coordinates

Returns

bool – Returns True of x and y coordinate lists are of same lengths
